channel.title: Command help
channel.description:
ok im new at programing so sorry if this is a stupid question.
id like too edit what player classes have what commands, for instance id like my mods too have ::jail ::mute admins have ::jail ::ban ::unjail ::umute. and owner too have all of these and the rest. so if someone can point me in the right direction please.
thanks alot.

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

If you’d like that specific rank to have that command only, just change the operator in the command; otherwise if you have ‘>=’, that’s for values of that specific variable and up. Thus, if you simply change the operator to ‘==’ it will activate the command only if the character rights are equal.

        if (command.startsWith("jail") && playerRights == 1) {

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

go into your client.java, find the commands, and where theres a <=1,2,or3 make it so its 1 for mod+ 2 for admin+ and 3 for owner

Read full topic
